{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ctek |model=G6200 NetServer |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=Yes |type=automation controller |pwr_v=9-24 |pwr_conn=terminal block |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=AT91SAM9G20 |cpu1_cspeed=202 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=45DB642D-CNU |fla2=256 |fla2_brand=Micron |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=AMIC |ram1_model=A43L4616AV-7UF |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, DE-9,, (38400,8,N,1),, ttyS2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9161 |eth_chip3_brand=SMSC |eth_chip3_model=LAN9500i |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Serial Port Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM3311;;2;,,, 5V Low Power EIA RS-485 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM485;;2;,,, |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, RS232, RS485, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.06 |stock_os=Linux;2.6.27 |default_ip=192.168.1.10 |default_user=root |default_pass=pass |oui_eth=00:06:EB }} {{TagLine|G6200 Series NetServer}} :[https://www.ctekproducts.com/hardware/g6200-series Product page]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atmel]]'' AT91SAM9G20 @ 202 MHz *Memory: 64MB *Onboard Storage: 8MB SPI NOR, 256MB NAND, MicroSD *Network: 2x FE *USB: 1x USB 2.0 Host, 1x USB Device *Serial: 2x RS232, 2x RS485
